mapper.insert: insert into tb_score_info (score_id, class_id, class_name, student_id, student_name, train_type, exercise_type, bank_id, bank_name, right_exercise_num, exercise_num, score, score_time) values (#{scoreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exerciseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rightExerciseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exerciseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scoreTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_score_info set class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, train_type = #{trainType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exercise_type = #{exerciseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, right_exercise_num = #{rightExerciseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exercise_num = #{exerciseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score_time = #{scoreTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where score_id = #{scoreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select score_id, class_id, class_name, student_id, student_name, train_type, exercise_type, bank_id, bank_name, right_exercise_num, exercise_num, score, score_time from tb_score_info where score_id = #{scoreId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select score_id, class_id, class_name, student_id, student_name, train_type, exercise_type, bank_id, bank_name, right_exercise_num, exercise_num, score, score_time from tb_score_info
select student_id, student_name, ROUND(avg(score)) score from tb_score_info where train_type=#{param1} GROUP BY student_id, student_name order by score DESC
